FROM ( SELECT AB.* , @ROWNUM:=@ROWNUM+1 as COUNT FROM ( SELECT CAST(SUBSTR(TP_KEYNO,-10) AS UNSIGNED) KEYNO, DATE_FORMAT(TP_REGDT,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') REGDT, TP.* FROM T_TOURISM_PROGRAM TP WHERE TP_TYPE = #{TP_TYPE} AND TP_DELYN = 'N' ) AB WHERE 1=1
AND KEYNO LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{item.searchKeyword} , '%')
AND TP_RESERVED_DATE LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{item.searchKeyword} , '%')
AND TP_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{item.searchKeyword} , '%')
AND TP_PHONE1 LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{item.searchKeyword} , '%')
AND REGDT LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{item.searchKeyword} , '%')
AND TP_STATUS = #{item.searchKeyword}
AND TP_PLACE LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{item.searchKeyword} , '%')
AND ( KEYNO LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{item.searchKeyword} , '%') OR TP_RESERVED_DATE LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{item.searchKeyword} , '%') OR TP_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{item.searchKeyword} , '%') OR TP_PHONE1 LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{item.searchKeyword} , '%') OR REGDT LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{item.searchKeyword} , '%') OR TP_STATUS = #{item.searchKeyword} OR TP_PLACE LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{item.searchKeyword} , '%') )
)AA
mapper.select: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(TP_REGDT,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') TP_REGDT , IF(TP_HAESEOL_YN ='Y','필요','불필요') TP_HAESEOL_YN , IF(TP_COURSE_YN = 'Y','필요','불필요') TP_COURSE_YN , IF(TP_PICUP_YN ='Y','필요','불필요') TP_PICUP_YN , TP.*, CS.SC_CODENM , (SELECT COUNT(*)+1 FROM T_TOURISM_PROGRAM_SUB WHERE TP.TP_KEYNO = TPS_TP_KEYNO) CHILDCNT FROM T_TOURISM_PROGRAM TP LEFT JOIN T_COMMON_CODE_SUB CS ON TP_DIVISION = CS.SC_KEYNO WHERE TP_KEYNO = #{TP_KEYNO}
SELECT TPS.*, CS.SC_CODENM FROM T_TOURISM_PROGRAM_SUB TPS LEFT JOIN T_COMMON_CODE_SUB CS ON TPS.TPS_DIVISION = CS.SC_KEYNO WHERE TPS_TP_KEYNO = #{TP_KEYNO}

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(TP_REGDT,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') TP_REGDT , IF(TP_HAESEOL_YN = 'Y','필요','불필요') TP_HAESEOL_YN , IF(TP_COURSE_YN = 'Y','필요','불필요') TP_COURSE_YN , IF(TP_PICUP_YN = 'Y','필요','불필요') TP_PICUP_YN , TP.* , CS.SC_CODENM , (SELECT COUNT(*)+1 FROM T_TOURISM_PROGRAM_SUB WHERE TP.TP_KEYNO = TPS_TP_KEYNO) CHILDCNT FROM T_TOURISM_PROGRAM TP LEFT JOIN T_COMMON_CODE_SUB CS ON TP_DIVISION = CS.SC_KEYNO WHERE TP_NAME = #{TP_NAME} AND TP_PHONE1 = #{TP_PHONE1} AND TP_TYPE = #{TP_TYPE} AND TP_DELYN = 'N'

SELECT IFNULL(TPS_NAME,' ') TPS_NAME, IFNULL(TPS_PHONE,' ') TPS_PHONE, CS.SC_CODENM FROM T_TOURISM_PROGRAM_SUB TPS LEFT JOIN T_COMMON_CODE_SUB CS ON TPS_DIVISION = CS.SC_KEYNO WHERE TPS_TP_KEYNO = #{TP_KEYNO}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT * FROM T_TOURISM_PROGRAM WHERE TP_TYPE = #{TP_TYPE} AND TP_DELYN = 'N' )

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(C.TP_REGDT,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') TP_REGDT , CONCAT(SUBSTR(C.TP_NAME,1,1) , LPAD('*',CHAR_LENGTH(C.TP_NAME)-1,'*')) TP_NAME , CONCAT(LPAD('*',3,'*') , '-' , LPAD('*',4,'*') , '-' , LPAD('*',1,'*') , SUBSTR(C.TP_PHONE1,-3)) TP_PHONE1 , C.* FROM ( SELECT @rownum:=@rownum+1 as RNUM, A.* FROM( SELECT * FROM T_TOURISM_PROGRAM WHERE TP_TYPE = #{TP_TYPE} AND TP_DELYN = 'N' ) A ,(SELECT @rownum:=0)TMP ORDER BY RNUM DESC ) C
LIMIT #{recordCountPerPage} OFFSET #{firstIndex}
